ü§∏ FUN-FILLED VR FITNESS
Jump into a world of exhilarating fitness where your workouts aren‚Äôt just exercises; they're fun! 

ü•äVARIETY OF WORKOUT TYPES
Choose from a diverse range of workouts including boxing, strength training, and bootcamp to keep your fitness routine exciting.

üèÖ REAL TRAINERS GUIDE YOU
Workout alongside real trainers from the comfort of your home. Mixed reality brings expert trainers into your home with motivation and knowledge.

‚õ∞Ô∏è CAPTIVATING WORKOUT ENVIRONMENTS
Experience a workout like never before with captivating environments from mountains to lakes to futuristic spaceships, breathtaking views, and more. 

üÜïNEW CLASSES ADDED WEEKLY
With a continuously expanding library and fresh workouts added weekly, there's always something new and exciting to try.

‚ö°Ô∏è ALL LEVELS WELCOME
Whether you're a beginner who's just starting out or an expert looking to take your workouts to the next level, Litesport has tailored workouts to match your abilities, ensuring everyone can join in the fun.

üé∂ MUSIC TO MOVE TO WHILE HAVING FUN
Every-growing hi-tempo music library to keep you inspired daily

‚úÖ ACHIEVEMENT TOOLS
Weekly goals and badges award you for working out more and keep you accountable

üÜì 7-DAY FREE TRIAL
Are you ready to give it a try? Start your 7-day trial today.

changelog.change_log:
New Feature
Added a new Freestyle Workout results screen.

Improvements
Added a green outline to the Strength Training weight selection to improve visibility.
Improved the color uniformity of the workout selection screens.
Added an error box to the keyboard to make text field requirements more obvious.
Various other UI improvements.

Bug Fixes
Fixed an intermittent issue that prevented workout selection.
Fixed a bug that was causing the wrong muscle group tiles to display
Fixed a bug that caused the wrong header tab to appear as selected in some circumstances.
Fixed a bug that prevented matches successfully sending from the results screen.
Fixed some bugs that caused large score values to wrap to a second line.
Fixed some text overlapping issues on the strength training pause screen.
Fixed some issues with workout filtering that caused content to not display.
Fixed a playlist filtering bug.
Fixed a bug that caused some playlists to not proceed to the next track.
Fixed some issues that caused the laser pointers to stop working.
Various other minor UI bug fixes.

## New Features
* Added a female muscle diagram for Strength workouts.
* You can now create a match from a past result in your activity history.
* Implemented chip filters that show up to 4 selected criteria on content select screens.
* Created profiles for Litesport trainers‚Äô community pages.


## Improvements
* Revamped post-workout results screens.
* Improved the pause screen.
* Rendered a fade transition on the muscle heatmap so you can see it change after a Strength workout.
* Looped streak celebration colors for more variety at higher punch counts. This does not affect the score. It just looks cooler.

## Bugfixes
* Decoupled the hands; e.g., if you put your left hand behind your back the right laser pointer will still work.
* Fixed the Lobby Music coming in after a Punch Track preview even if you had it off.
* Synchronized the time bar and muscle group widget for Strength workouts.

## New Features
* Rebranded to Litesport throughout the app.
* Moved from tap/touch input to laser pointer input.
* Added Strength Training. Bring weights into VR and let our trainers help you focus on key muscles!
* Added Punch Track song previews.
* Activity History can now be sorted.
* You can now check the leaderboard, favorite content, and replay it from Activity History results.
* Freestyle sessions are now saved to your Activity History.


## Improvements
* Redesigned all menus.

## Bugfixes
* Prevented input from going through pop ups to click what‚Äôs behind them.
* Addressed issues with the workout pause screen and hand tracking.
* Fixed the exercise timer sometimes failing to show up during Total Body.
* Made Trainer Classes have the correct number of total hits in the denominator.
Fixed a bug that prevented some users from loading content
